patthana14.31:1.1: Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:2.1: Appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.31:3.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.31:4.1: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:5.1: Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.31:6.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.31:7.1: Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:8.1: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.31:9.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.31:10.1: Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.31:11.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.31:12.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
